questions.question: The process of selecting the desired frequency from a composite wave is called.

explanations.a: Filtering removes unwanted components from a signal.
explanations.b: Demodulation extracts the original information signal.
explanations.d: Tuning is the correct answer; it selects the desired frequency.

questions.question: Tuning circuit use the principle of......

explanations.a: Modulation refers to altering the signal.
explanations.b: Maximum energy transfer is a general principle.
explanations.c: Mutual inductance relates to coupled coils.
explanations.d: Resonance is the correct principle used in tuning circuits.
